tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrafficInformation (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    traffic_status VARCHAR(50),
    road_condition VARCHAR(50),
    weather_condition VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  condition_id INT,
  update_time TIMESTAMP,
  update_description TEXT
  FOREIGN KEY (condition_id) REFERENCES traffic_conditions(condition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE real_time_traffic_data (
  traffic_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  speed INT NOT NULL,
  traffic_congestion BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  starting_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  ending_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_updates (
  update_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  traffic_id INT REFERENCES real_time_traffic_data(traffic_id),
  update_message TEXT NOT NULL,
  update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_locations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  latitude DECIMAL,
  longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_id INT,
  incident_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  incident_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(100),
  report_date TIMESTAMP,
  report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE traffic_routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location_id INT,
  end_location_id INT,
  route_description TEXT,
  route_distance DECIMAL
)
